Outline: • Concept and components of voice: - Importance of the voice. - Voice characteristics and its effect on the receiver. - Voice and its relationship to personality, mental state and self-confidence. • Control and mastery of voice: - Breathing form the diaphragm. - Relaxation, concentration and control of fear and emotions. • Voice expression: - Vocal layering. - Voice strength and presence. - Voice rhythm, speed, and dynamics. - Tone and vocal image. • Presentation and diction: - Articulation and pronunciation. - Text segmentation and stress points in sentences.
Benefits: • An electronic graduation certificate by Aljazeera Media Institute.

Title: Wildlife Photography
Description: Wildlife photography is one of the visual arts that brings people closer to their surrounding environment. The ability to capture attractive and beautiful scenes in the wild relies on having the necessary skills, techniques, tricks, and tools for learning and obtaining perfect shots. Getting more beautiful shots, choosing the right place and time, and getting familiar with wildlife photography equipment is what you'll learn during this course.
Prerequisites: • Desire to learn the basics of wildlife photography. • At least high school diploma.
Objectives: By the end of this course, participants will:• Choose the appropriate camera type and accessories.• Enhance the quality of photography by controlling camera settings.• Control the image and work with natural light.• Practice and master wildlife photography techniques.
Outline: • Principles of photography and Its tools: - Additional camera accessories. - Choose the right camera. - Lenses: full frame and cropped frame. - Sensors and megapixels. • Camera settings and control: - Composition rules and aesthetics. - Dealing with different light sources. - Focus point and its modes. - Determine the focus point. • Image and lighting control: - ISO. - Color depth and dynamic range. - Frames Per Second (FPS). - Lens aperture and depth of field. • Advanced photography techniques: - Shutter speed. - Camera sensor capability. - White balance.
Benefits: • A graduation certificate by Aljazeera Media Institute.

Title: Novels Narrative Structure
Description: If you want to write a novel and are still hesitant or if you want to learn about novel writing techniques, then this course is for you. It provides an introduction to research, narrative methods, character development, and plot construction. You might also discover that you have the potential to be a novelist if you haven't explored your creative side yet.
Prerequisites: • Possessing reading and research skills.
Objectives: By the end of this course, participants will:• Build a strong foundation for novel writing.• Apply research techniques and gather information effectively.• Develop and enhance novel characters.• Utilize narrative methods with proficiency.
Outline: • Introduction to novel writing: - Define the novel based on narrative schools. - Writing obstacles and challenges. - Narrative time and its role in creating suspense. - Writing the narrative location and refining Its elements. • Research and writing applications in the novel: - Research and planning before writing. - Stages and sources of research. - Research considerations. • Developing characters and narrative elements: - Describing characters; physical, mental, and cultural descriptions. - Pronouns, "narrative voices," and optimal ways to use them. - Create and define characters and maintain them. - "Point of view" character and its role in guiding the narrative. • Writing and narrative techniques: - General form of the novel. - Use description and plot in the novel. - Types of narrative dialogue and considerations for use. - Transitioning from narrative to dialogue and vice versa.
Benefits: • A graduation certificate by Aljazeera Media Institute.

Title: Negotiation and Persuasion Skills
Description: The transfer of information or facts and convincing others of it is not an easy task. This requires diverse skills, self-confidence, and high performance, in addition to a good understanding of the subject you are engaging in. This course will enable trainees who are interested in enhancing their persuasion and negotiation skills to break through the barrier of fear and confusion when speaking to a large audience, build high self-confidence, and enhance their personal image to achieve their professional goals.
Prerequisites: • High School diploma, preferably a university degree in any field.
Objectives: By the end of this course, participants will:• Present ideas and projects in a coherent and effective manner. • Use negotiation and persuasion techniques in practice. • Demonstrate professional performance and boost self-confidence.
Outline: • Successful delivery techniques of projects and ideas: - Prepare topics and the benefits within it. - Emotional impact on the audience. - Implementation of excellent links and time control. - Master an attractive conclusion. • Persuasion and negotiation techniques: - Identify the necessary preparations for individual's persuasion strength. - Transitioning from individual persuasion to collaborative persuasion. - Dialogue and negotiation techniques: evidence and proof. • Professional performance: - Self-confidence: enhancing personal image. - Body language control. - Control speech clarity and voice tone.
Benefits: • A graduation certificate by Aljazeera Media Institute.

Title: Identifying Personality Types ( Online )
Description: Many people and institutions waste their energies devoted to production due to personal conflicts, and this has been magnified by the increasing use of smart modern communication tools that hide more than they appear. Your confirmed knowledge of your personality pattern and the expansion of your knowledge to be able to identify the personality pattern of those you deal with in order to communicate with them professionally, is a decisive factor in stopping this waste of personal and organizational productivity and thus achieving the strategic goals of the individual and the organization as planned.
Prerequisites: • High school diploma or university degree from any discipline. • Professional experience, regardless of the nature of the work.
Objectives: By the end of this course, participants will: • Identify the fundamentals and skills of communication. • Practice effective communication in personal and professional relationships. • Explore different personality types and interact with them effectively.
Outline: • Introduction to effective communication in relationships: - Concept of communication in relationships and the reasons for its failure. - Roles of the effective communication process. - Impact of emotions on communication. - The speak and listen circles and the interaction between them. • Communication method: - Meeting point for individuals with different perspectives, WIIFM approach. - Common symbols. - Choose an effective method of communication. • Personal styles and relationships: - The four types of personality. - Pure personal styles. - Interrelated personal styles. - Combine different styles in compulsory relationships.
Benefits: • An electronic graduation certificate by Aljazeera Media Institute.
